settings.text: We use high quality 14K PVD plating (use real gold). Gold PVD coatings is done using real gold. We offers gold PVD coating that's wear and corrosion resistant, chemical resistant, has a low coefficient of friction and is low maintenance.

settings.code:
SHIPPING DETAILS:

  • FAST & FREE Shipping
  • Next business day shipping
  • Ships from Southern California, U.S.A.
  • Arrives in 2-7 business days in the U.S.A

RETURN POLICY:

  • 7 day money back guarantee
  • Buyer pays return shipping cost
  • Item must be in unused condition
  • Immediate refund upon return

QUALITY YOU CAN TRUST:

  • 14K Gold Plated & Gold Filled Quailty
    • We use high quality 14K PVD plating (use real gold).Gold PVD coatings is done using real gold. We offers gold PVD coating that's wear and corrosion resistant, chemical resistant,has a low coefficient of friction,sturdy & durable quality,and is low maintenance.

settings.title: Shipping Information
settings.content:
Shipping

Orders ship out Monday-Saturday 

All orders ship out the next day.

Shipping Time

Our FREE Shipping service takes about 3-7 business days to arrive to you.

Note: All Shipping times are time estimates provided by the shipping companies and are not guarantees. If you need faster shipping than our standard 3-7 day shipping, we offer faster shipping services at an extra cost at check out.

Please note all orders $150 usd or above will require signature upon delivery. 

If you have any questions regarding shipping feel free to contact us on our live chat or email us at support@luxeandcojewelry.org

settings.title: Returns & Exchanges
settings.content:
RETURN POLICY:

7 day money back guarantee

Buyer will get return shipping label. Once returned the shipping fee will be deducted from the refund.

Item must be in unused condition

Immediate refund upon return once inspected from damages or wears.

Items sent back to us without first requesting a return or contacting us will not be accepted.

Please note the following items are final sales and not availble for return/exchanges.

Earrings

Custom Jewelry

EXCHANGES POLICY:

The fastest way to ensure you get what you want is to return the item you have, and once the return is accepted, make a separate purchase for the new item.

settings.title: Quality You Can Trust
settings.content:
14K Gold Plated & Gold Filled Quailty

We use high quality 14K PVD plating (use real gold). Gold PVD coatings is done using real gold.

We offers gold PVD coating that's wear and corrosion resistant, chemical resistant,has a low coefficient of friction,sturdy & durable quality,and is low maintenance.
